alert.note: Alert for Kittitas Valley (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 10 at 10:15PM PST until December 11 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter to one half mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In Oregon, Lower Columbia Basin of Oregon. In Washington, Kittitas Valley. * WHEN...Until noon PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...In areas with below freezing temperatures, fog droplets will freeze on surfaces, creating slick roadways and other surfaces such as sidewalks and decks.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
